com.percussion.extension
Interface IPSWorkFlowContext

public interface IPSWorkFlowContext

This interface provides a convenient way to bundle together information needed to process a workflow content item. It is used by IPSWorkflowAction.

Field Summary
static int WORKFLOW_CONTEXT_INITIAL_INTEGER_VALUE
           
static String WORKFLOW_CONTEXT_PRIVATE_OBJECT
          Key used to obtain the PSWorkFlowContext private object created by IPSRequestContext.setPrivateObject
 
Method Summary
 int getBaseRevisionNum()
          Gets a revision number for the content item for transitions - current revision for checkin - revision being checked in for checkout - base revision for the item being checked out: either 1, or the revision of the item copied to create the revision checked out
 int getContentID()
          Gets the content item database ID.
 int getHistoryID()
          Gets the content status history entry database ID.
 int getStateID()
          Gets the current content state database ID.
 int getTransitionID()
          Gets the transition database ID.
 int getWorkflowID()
          Gets the workflow database ID.
 

Field Detail

WORKFLOW_CONTEXT_PRIVATE_OBJECT

static final String WORKFLOW_CONTEXT_PRIVATE_OBJECT
Key used to obtain the PSWorkFlowContext private object created by IPSRequestContext.setPrivateObject

WORKFLOW_CONTEXT_INITIAL_INTEGER_VALUE

static final int WORKFLOW_CONTEXT_INITIAL_INTEGER_VALUE
See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

getWorkflowID

int getWorkflowID()
Gets the workflow database ID.

Returns:
database ID of workflow

getContentID

int getContentID()
Gets the content item database ID.

Returns:
database ID of content item

getBaseRevisionNum

int getBaseRevisionNum()
Gets a revision number for the content item
  • for transitions - current revision
  • for checkin - revision being checked in
  • for checkout - base revision for the item being checked out: either 1, or the revision of the item copied to create the revision checked out

Returns:
revision number of content item

getTransitionID

int getTransitionID()
Gets the transition database ID.

Returns:
  • database ID of transition
  • 0 for checkin or checkout
  • IPSConstants.TRANSITIONID_NO_ACTION_TAKEN if no action was taken

getStateID

int getStateID()
Gets the current content state database ID. If a transition has occurred this will be the new state ID.

Returns:
database ID of current/new content state

getHistoryID

int getHistoryID()
Gets the content status history entry database ID.

Returns:
content status history entry database ID or WORKFLOW_CONTEXT_INITIAL_INTEGER_VALUE if the content status history entry has not yet been created.
